resources.string: This is the main screen, where the top picks for the categories Songs, Artists and Albums are displayed. The search box is used to look up for music (search functionality is not implemented). Clicking on a category name, the user will navigate to a new screen. The lists of Views should be dynamically created and added to the screen.
This is the screen for the currently playing song. Further functionality is not implemented.

This is the screen where the list of the songs will be displayed. The user can scroll down the list. The lists of Views should be dynamically created and added to the screen. When the song is clicked, the Now Playing screen will be shown.

This is the screen where the list of the artists will be displayed. Lists should by dynamically created. The user can scroll down the list. When the artist is clicked, the personal Artist screen will be shown with his albums and singles.

This is the screen where the list of the artist albums and singles is shown. Lists should by dynamically created. If the album is clicked, the Now Playing screen will be shown, playing the first song in the album. If the single is clicked, the Now Playing screen will be shown.

This is the screen where the list of the albums will be displayed. Lists should by dynamically created. If the album is clicked, the Now Playing screen will be shown, playing the first song in the album.
